summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6118 for the improvement of 24th Avenue West from Emerson Street to West Bertona Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 84544, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
